channel.title: Command
channel.description:
I was wondering if there was a way to make it so that i could just type ::makemod (username) or ::makeadmin (username)
if so can someoen plz give me the code.

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

You know where commands are in client.java ? if you know make a new command :
else if (command.startsWith(“make”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
ReplaceObject(absX, (absY + 1),
Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 9)),
Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10)));
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::make #### #”);
}

Read full topic

} else if (command.startsWith("make") && playerRights >= 2) { try { ReplaceObject(absX, (absY + 1), Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5, 9)), Integer.parseInt(command.substring(10))); } catch (Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::make #### #"); }
